body.name: Tolife Air Purifiers for Home Large Room Up to1291 Ft² with Air Quality Sensors True HEPA Filter, Auto & Timing Function, HEPA Air Purifiers for Bedroom, Remove Smoke, Allergies,Dust, Pet Hair, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 48 mins
features: Efficient air purifiers:3-in-1 HEPA filtration and high efficiency filtration system provide fresh air to a space of 1,291ft ² per hour, capturing 99.97% of the particles in the air, the CADR of 166CFM/280m³/h, the higher the CARD value, the larger the area of purified air, completely covering and refreshing every corner, Great air purifier for home large room

HEPA Air Filter: Our air purifiers have a 3-in-1 HEPA filter that can capture 0 in the air. Micron particles, filter 99.97% of dust in the air, pet dander, pollen, etc., relieve allergic sneezing; The activated carbon filter removes smoke, pet odors, and volatile organic compounds. Provide fresh air to your home or office throughout the day

Smart air purifiers for home:This air clraners for home comes built-in a PM2.5 sensor, in the auto mode, the air purifier will automatically detect the concentration of PM2.5 in the air. When the air quality deteriorates, The indicator light will turn yellow/red, and the air purifier will automatically speed up the wind speed and purify the air faster

Air purifier for bedroom: High-quality sleep partners, you can choose the sleep mode at night, the noise of the air purifier running in the sleep mode is low to 24db (equal to silent mode), all the lights are off, will not disturb your sleep, providing you with a quiet and comfortable sleep for a whole night

Timer mode:2H-4H-6H-8H cycle timing Settings, you can time the air purifier according to your needs. Save money on your electricity bill，It is the great air purifier for bedroom, kitchen, large room and office

Air filter Replacement Reminder: ToLife hepa air purifier are equipped with a cartridge replacement reminder. Once the filter has been in use for more than 2000 hours, a red indicator light will turn on to remind you to replace the filter cartridge. For optimal performance, we recommend you to replace the air filter cartridge once every 3-6 months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier quickly eliminates odors and sports a very attractive design that meshes well with my white and black room aesthetic. The unit is surprisingly quiet as well, which makes it convenient to use at any time, night or day. It was very easy to set up and it came with a clear set of instructions should I need any assistance in understanding the unit’s features. The fact that this air purifier quickly eliminates odors leads me to believe that it is truly purifying the air at a rapid and consistent pace. The packaging was also very attractive, reflecting the overall high quality of this air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in kitchen.
reviews.reviewText: I like this purifier that it’s not too big but still have a lot of power to do the job. I’m using it in the kitchen, and the active carbon filter does a great job of removing odors after cooking. I also like that it automatically detects the air quality and turns the low or high fan speed if you use it in an auto mode.BTW the low mode is very quiet and the lights can be turned off if you are planning to use it in a bedroom. It also has a sleep mode, which do all these things automatically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and quite air purifier
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is great! I put this upstairs in the hallway for my family and it seems to work nicely. I've used sleep mode a few times and it's quiet, you almost don't hear it if you don't listen closely. I wouldn't recommend putting this inside your room and closing the doors though, because it did make my throat a bit dry. It isn't a big problem and can easily be avoided if you open the doors. I also liked the smart features which can automatically detect and adjust fan speed according to air quality. The air quality indications are another plus as they tell you how bad the air currently is. It also clears cooking odors quite well, which is a plus as I cook quite often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and quiet air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Nicely built with a modern look. Very quiet and does a great job. Filter is thick and large can be used for a good period of time. Nice to have a scent compartment to add preferred scent. Very light and easy to move around. I would recommend it and will likely get another one for bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. I just set them up today, bought two, so we'll see how it goes after a few months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the design and happy for the performance
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this air purifier for about two weeks, and I'm impressed with its features and performance. The design caught my eye, and its overall functionality has meet my expectations.One standout feature is its quiet operation, allowing me to enjoy cleaner air without any disturbance. The air purifier offers three performance levels and four timer settings (2, 4, 6, and continuous operation), providing flexibility based on my needs.Additionally, the lighting options contribute to its modernized design. I highly recommend this air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Quiet: A Top Pick for Large Room Air Purification
reviews.reviewText: Impressed with the air purifier for large rooms! It effectively tackles odors, runs quietly, and has a sleek design. Intuitive controls, energy-efficient, and easy understand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and compact. Fashionable appearance. The air filtration effect is very good. I also added essential oils and the room smells great, I really enjoy using this product, it not only masks odors but also creates a good living environment for me, I love it!
